windows_python_command.issue: Python command not found in Windows

mcp_stdin_handling.solution: Use async executor instead of synchronous readline

powershell_syntax.solution: Use separate commands instead of && chaining

utf8_encoding.issue: UTF-8 encoding issues with special characters
utf8_encoding.solution: Explicitly specify encoding='utf-8' in file operations

windows_file_paths.solution: Use backslashes on Windows, Path() for cross-platform

pip_path_issue.solution: Use 'py -m pip' instead of direct pip command
